text: 29.8 so close so today's video is a quick update on GameStop because we are coming into earnings soon and we are literally consolidating like this is a normal consolidation the ADR is a little bit wide with some of these candles being so broad but look at the volume and look at the price level this is about as exciting as I think it gets for GameStop as a company in general now I spe ify as a company in general because this doesn't necessarily strike me as parabolic short squeeze gamma squeeze up again it can always happen we don't know when the conditions are set for that to occur but what I'm highlighting is from an underlying company perspective this is a company that's actually gaining a little bit of attention and that's a good thing because if we look at the volume here it's been sustained from the aan November and the volume is high so it was 15 million here 26 million here 18 million here 18 and a half million here 16 and 12 here 16 and 12 here 8 and 12 8.7 22 as of today the reason why that matters is because a lot of people are curious you know if roaring Kitty's involved and literally who knows that that dude is like Batman he just kind of shows up when it's time for him to show up could be but the cool part about this is that even if roaring Kitty
